# 12.4 Mathモジュール

```
>> p Math.sqrt(2)
1.4142135623730951
=> 1.4142135623730951
>> p Math::E
2.718281828459045
>> p Math::PI
3.141592653589793
=> 3.141592653589793
>> 
>> include Math
=> Object
>> 
>> p sqrt(2)
1.4142135623730951
=> 1.4142135623730951
>> p E
2.718281828459045
=> 2.718281828459045
>> p PI
3.141592653589793
=> 3.141592653589793
```
